languages.text: "Ну а само судно — ценнейший подарок династии! Нужен лишь незначительный ремонт". {n}Высокий Фактотум в предвкушении потирает пальцы.{/n} "Что предпочтете с ним сделать? Можете презентовать его нашим торговым партнерам. Уверен, они найдут ему применение! С другой стороны, мы можем перевести часть ваших подданных в команду "Бессердечного" и сделать из него курсирующее торговое судно. Такое решение сулит большие прибыли!"

"The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"
languages.original_text: "Ну а само судно — ценнейший подарок династии! Нужен лишь незначительный ремонт". {n}Высокий Фактотум в предвкушении потирает пальцы.{/n} "Что предпочтете с ним сделать? Можете презентовать его нашим торговым партнерам. Уверен, они найдут ему применение! С другой стороны, мы можем перевести часть ваших подданных в команду "Бессердечного" и сделать из него курсирующее торговое судно. Такое решение сулит большие прибыли!"

Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, certainly!"

You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! languages.text: «¡La nave también es una adquisición extremadamente impresionante para la dinastía! Solo necesita unos arreglos». {n}Janris se frota las manos con ansia.{/n} «¿Qué quiere que hagamos con ella? Podría regalársela a nuestros socios comerciales; ¡estoy convencido de que podrán darle un buen uso! Alternativamente, podríamos transferir a algunos de sus súbditos a la Desalmada y utilizarla para aumentar el comercio entre nuestros propios mundos. ¡Es una opción rentable, desde luego!».
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La nave también es una adquisición extremadamente impresionante para la dinastía! Solo necesita unos arreglos». {n}Janris se frota las manos con ansia.{/n} «¿Qué quiere que hagamos con ella? Podría regalársela a nuestros socios comerciales; ¡estoy convencido de que podrán darle un buen uso! Alternativamente, podríamos transferir a algunos de sus súbditos a la Desalmada y utilizarla para aumentar el comercio entre nuestros propios mundos. ¡Es una opción rentable, desde luego!».

languages.text: “除此之外，对王朝而言，这艘船本身也是件非常贵重的战利品！只要稍微修理一下，它就能重新服役了。”{n}詹里斯兴奋地搓着双手，满眼期待。{/n}“您希望我们如何处理这艘船呢？您可以把它带给您的贸易伙伴，我相信您的伙伴会善加利用！或者，我们也可以把您的一部分臣民转移到无心号，以此加强您领地之间的贸易。很显然，这是个划算的选择！”
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，对王朝而言，这艘船本身也是件非常贵重的战利品！只要稍微修理一下，它就能重新服役了。”{n}詹里斯兴奋地搓着双手，满眼期待。{/n}“您希望我们如何处理这艘船呢？您可以把它带给您的贸易伙伴，我相信您的伙伴会善加利用！或者，我们也可以把您的一部分臣民转移到无心号，以此加强您领地之间的贸易。很显然，这是个划算的选择！”

languages.text: « Sans compter que le vaisseau en lui-même est une formidable acquisition pour la dynastie ! Quelques petites réparations et il sera comme neuf ! {n}Janris se frotte les mains avec impatience.{/n} Que voulez-vous qu'on en fasse ? Vous pourriez l'offrir à nos partenaires commerciaux, je parie qu'ils sauraient en faire bon usage ! À moins que nous transférions une partie de vos sujets à bord du Sans-Cœur et que nous nous en servions pour promouvoir le négoce entre les mondes placés sous votre contrôle. Une option des plus lucratives, à n'en pas douter ! »
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"

traits.locale_text: « Sans compter que le vaisseau en lui-même est une formidable acquisition pour la dynastie ! Quelques petites réparations et il sera comme neuf ! {n}Janris se frotte les mains avec impatience.{/n} Que voulez-vous qu'on en fasse ? Vous pourriez l'offrir à nos partenaires commerciaux, je parie qu'ils sauraient en faire bon usage ! À moins que nous transférions une partie de vos sujets à bord du Sans-Cœur et que nous nous en servions pour promouvoir le négoce entre les mondes placés sous votre contrôle. Une option des plus lucratives, à n'en pas douter ! »

languages.text: 「船自体が王朝にとっても最も印象的な獲得です！必要なのはちょっとした修理だけです」{n}ジャンリスは期待した様子で手をすりあわせる。{/n}「それで、船をどう扱うべきでしょうか？貿易パートナーに示すこともできますし、彼らがそれを十分に利用できる自信を持っています！あるいは、あなたの臣民の一部をハートレスに転送し、貿易を増やすために使うことも可能です。間違いなく利益を生む選択肢です！」
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"

traits.locale_text: 「船自体が王朝にとっても最も印象的な獲得です！」{n}ジャンリスは期待した様子で手をすりあわせる。{/n}「それで、船をどう扱うべきでしょうか？貿易パートナーに示すこともできますし、彼らがそれを十分に利用できる自信を持っています！あるいは、あなたの臣民の一部をハートレスに転送し、貿易を増やすために使うことも可能です。間違いなく利益を生む選択肢です！」

languages.text: "Gemi, hanedanlık için oldukça etkileyici bir kazanım! Tek gereken, hafif bir tamirattan geçmesi." {n}Janris, beklentiyle ellerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Gemiyle ne yapmamızı istersiniz? Ticari ortaklarımıza verebiliriz. İyi değerlendireceklerinden eminim! Alternatif olarak tebaanızın bir kısmını Taşkalp'e aktarabilir ve kendi dünyalarınız arasındaki ticareti artırmak üzere görevlendirebilirsiniz. Bu da kesinlikle kârlı bir seçenek!"
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it? You could present it to our trading partners — I am confident that they would put it to good use! Alternatively, we could transfer some of your subjects to the Heartless and use it to increase trade between your own worlds. A profitable option, to be sure!"

traits.locale_text: "Gemi, hanedanlık için oldukça etkileyici bir kazanım! Tek gereken, hafif bir tamirattan geçmesi." {n}Janris, beklentiyle ellerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Gemiyle ne yapmamızı istersiniz? Ticari ortaklarımıza verebiliriz. İyi değerlendireceklerinden eminim! Alternatif olarak tebaanızın bir kısmını Taşkalp'e aktarabilir ve kendi dünyalarınız arasındaki ticareti artırmak üzere görevlendirebilirsiniz. Bu da kesinlikle kârlı bir seçenek!"

languages.text: "Auch das Schiff selbst ist für die Dynastie eine ausgesprochen beeindruckende Errungenschaft. Es bedarf lediglich einiger kleinerer Reparaturen." {n}Janris reibt sich voller Vorfreude die Hände.{/n} "Was sollen wir mit ihm machen? Ihr könntet es unseren Handelspartnern schenken ... Ich bin sicher, sie hätten Verwendung dafür! Oder wir verlegen einige Eurer Untertanen auf die Heartless und weiten den Handel zwischen unseren Welten mit ihrer Hilfe aus. Eine profitable Möglichkeit, ohne Zweifel."
languages.original_text: "The ship itself is a most impressive acquisition for the dynasty also! All it requires is some light repair work." {n}Janris rubs his hands together in anticipation.{/n} "What would you have us do with it?
